default.shortDescription: AvePoint enables organizations to collaborate with confidence as the largest provider of Microsoft 365 data migration, management and protection solutions. We migrate, manage and protect data in Microsoft 365. More than 7 million cloud users rely on our solutions.
featuredParagraphs: Sprawl. Governance. Exposure. Likely a few of the scary words that pop up when you’re thinking about your current or future Microsoft 365 environment. AvePoint’s solutions ensure these words stay, well, words.
Since 2001, we’ve helped tens of thousands of organizations worldwide to collaborate with confidence. We can help you too!
